body: Slave blood fuels the hobgoblin war machine. Pit bosses extract the last breath of labor from their charges with a liberal touch of the lash. Hobgoblins with this racial trait gain proficiency with whips and a +1 racial bonus on combat maneuver checks made to disarm or trip with a whip. This racial trait replaces sneaky.
name: Pit Boss
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Hobgoblins/Alternate Racial Traits/Pit Boss
